body.name: CARPETNAL White Dresser, Modern Dresser for Bedroom, 6 Drawer Double Dresser with Metal Handles, Dresser for Hallway, Entryway
features: Modern Design: White finish exterior and metal handles make white dresser for bedroom more attractive, elegant style can easily fit into various living spaces: living room, bedroom, hallway, entryway, office, etc. Decorate your home space.

Multifunctional Chest of Drawers: This white chest of drawers for bedroom is consists of 6 separate drawers, which is providing sufficient storage space to organize items. Great for organizing socks, clothes, books, Switch, kids toys and more. The top is great for displaying photos, clocks, lamps, TV and more to keep the room organized.

Durable & Stable: 6 drawer dresser is made of durable CARB P2 certified particleboard material, which is waterproof and scratch-resistant, durable and easy to clean; large storage cabinet and apered solid wood legs support under each drawer make it more stable.
Dimensions: Overall dimensions of this wood dresser are: 47.25''(L) x 15.75"(W) x 30.51"(H). Inside drawer dimensions: 19.4''(L) x 11"(W) x5.5 "(H).

Assembly & Customer Service: The dresser for bedroom attach with assembly instructions, all pieces are clearly lables, clear and simple. You can quickly complete the assembly. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem within 24 hours.
body.description: CARPETNAL White Dresser for your Home CARPETNAL drawer storage dresser, meet your new neat and orderly life. The combination of 6 drawer storage space and smooth glide system can keep daily used items handy and clean. Stylish design, fine workmanship, it is a great dresser choice for your family room, bedroom living room, nurseries, hallway. Modern design makes this dresser a great decoration. High-grade durable material brings a better experience. Specifications: Color: White Material: Particle Board, Solid Wood Overall Dimension: 47.25" (L) x 15.75" (W) x 30.51" (H) Inside Drawer Dimensions: 19.4''(L) x 11"(W) x5.5 "(H). Weight Capacity: 150lbs on the top, 35lbs each drawer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice looking small-ish dresser
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small dresser to fit under a shelf in a closet without having to modify the shelf. This dresser fit the bill, and it was fairly easy to assemble. The instructions say not to use a power drill, but I did--carefully--otherwise, you'd be manually screwing in tiny screws forever. The key is going slowly and not overpowering the clutch.Anyway, it took about 2 hours to put together, including fixing one instance of putting the rollers on incorrectly due to a misleading drawing. Though the instructions look like you should put the right side rollers on to protrude past the frame--don't do it! Also, they drawings show which screw holes to use for the rollers and this is very important.Overall, very happy with it for the looks and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, be patient
reviews.reviewText: This is a super cute dresser. This would be perfect for a nursery or a toddlers room (which is what we got it for). This would definitely be too small for an older teenager or an adults room. The quality is really nice and it is super cute. All the pieces were there and not damaged at all. The only reason I’m giving a four-star is because it took a lot of time to put together. The directions were not super clear. Took about 3 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this piece is good and it arrived in good condition with no missing parts. The assembly instructions were written well with easy to read/follow diagrams. I assembled this mostly by myself in about three hours, with my husband’s help for a couple of minutes here and there. The only tool I needed was a screwdriver. The instructions say not to use a drill and I did try anyway, but the screws will ream easily with a drill, so trust the instructions and all should go well. The drawers in particular are sturdy and the finish on the whole pice is very good. I have white kitchen cabinets with black hardware and I bought this to use for extra storage. It blends nicely with my cabinets and doesn’t stand out at all, which is exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture is pretty and I hoped it would be just what I needed so I ordered two for both bedrooms.Pictures are deceiving. These dressers are extremely cheap, very difficult to put together and we were never able to get the drawers to align. Some of the drawers won’t even shut no matter what we tried.It is very unbalanced and tips forward slightly. Completely unsafe. I only put one together and am sending the other back without even opening it.I wish I could return the one I put together but can’t. It is horrible and I don’t know what I’m going to do with it - it’s sitting in my garage with the rest of the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but practical
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is tiny but it does work for small spaces. I wish it was a tad taller with one more set of drawers because you can’t fit a lot of adult clothes in it. It is perfect for a little kid room. The smell is strong but goes away eventually. It took a couple hours to assemble. It is sturdy enough! It comes with the wall safety straps. I think it’s a bit pricey for what it is, but I would still recommend esp if you have a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Update- Seller contacted us to find a resolution for the issues. Great customer service, very much appreciated.Similar experience as other reviews. The dresser from a distance looks just as pictured, but up close its a mess. The paint is rough, the drawer faces have white lines at the top left corner where they were glued together on all 6 drawers. Its pretty cheaply made, not worth its hefty price tag.Arrived in a thin box with no protective material so it was damaged. Our damaged parts ended up being on the bottom or in the back so we went with assembling it, wish we would have returned it.Super difficult to put together, took us 4 hours. Some of the pre-drilled holes did not align correctly, some of them were clearly incorrectly drilled. We matched up all the drawer pieces together and 4 of them had holes that were much larger then the rest. All the screws for these pieces are the same size so its clearly a mistake.The drawers are WAY smaller then expected. The dimensions for this dresser are bigger then the dresser we replaced, but the drawers for some reason are much smaller.I can say from a distance it still looks nice, the finish on the top piece is nice, and the drawers pull out nicely, but the cons out weight the pros, it is not at all worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of screws takes awhile to pull together
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, great for a small bedroom to accommodate a queen bed.
